segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Configure Application Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Configure Application Page

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Configure Application Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Configure Application Page

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Configure Application Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Configure Application Page

segment.source: Use the Configure Applications page of the App-V Sequencing Wizard to add applications to a sequenced application package and to add or delete shortcuts and file type associations.
segment.target: Use the Configure Applications page of the App-V Sequencing Wizard to add applications to a sequenced application package and to add or delete shortcuts and file type associations.

segment.source: The page contains the elements described in the following table.
segment.target: The page contains the elements described in the following table.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Application
segment.target: Application

segment.source: Displays a list of applications, which can be expanded to add or edit file type associations.
segment.target: Displays a list of applications, which can be expanded to add or edit file type associations.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Displays the name of the application you are sequencing.
segment.target: Displays the name of the application you are sequencing.

segment.source: Version
segment.target: Version

segment.source: Displays the version number for the application you are sequencing.
segment.target: Displays the version number for the application you are sequencing.

segment.source: Command Line
segment.target: Command Line

segment.source: Displays any command-line directive of the application you are sequencing.
segment.target: Displays any command-line directive of the application you are sequencing.

segment.source: Add
segment.target: Add

segment.source: Adds a selected application to a package.
segment.target: Adds a selected application to a package.

segment.source: Remove
segment.target: Remove

segment.source: Deletes a selected application from a package.
segment.target: Deletes a selected application from a package.

segment.source: Edit
segment.target: Edit

segment.source: Enables editing of the application path and OSD file properties of the selected application.
segment.target: Enables editing of the application path and OSD file properties of the selected application.

segment.source: Back
segment.target: Back

segment.source: Goes to the previous page of the wizard.
segment.target: Goes to the previous page of the wizard.

segment.source: Next
segment.target: Next

segment.source: Goes to the next page of the wizard
segment.target: Goes to the next page of the wizard

segment.source: Cancel
segment.target: Cancel

segment.source: Discards the settings and closes the wizard.
segment.target: Discards the settings and closes the wizard.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Sequencing Wizard
segment.target: Sequencing Wizard
